Package org.phpmaven.plugin.build

Class Summary
AbstractPharMojo pack a phar file using the contents of the library.
AbstractPharMojo.PharContentEntry The phar content entry used by configuration.
AbstractPhpMojo Helper class to give fast access to the PHP executable and the basic configuration.
AbstractPhpResources php-validate execute the php with all php files under the source folder.
FileHelper Static utilities for file handling.
PhpPhar pack a phar file using the contents of the library.
PhpResources php-validate execute the php with all php files under the source folder.
PhpTest PHPUnit executes phpunit TestCases and generate SourceFire Reports.
PhpTestResources php-validate execute the php with all php files under the source folder.
SetSources Sets the source folders to php-maven sepcification (src/main/php and src/test/php).
 

Enum Summary
PhpVersion Several PHP versions.
 

Exception Summary
UnitTestCaseFailureException Result of a failed unit test case.
